title: Rival Territory
time_elapsed: Same day as Ch5 dismissal, evening
plot_threads_advanced: Yuki Tanaka officially joins the team despite professional rivalry
Team identifies five distinct encoding layers in Voyager signal
Decision to pursue ArXiv preprint publication strategy
Plan to acquire supercomputing resources through Sofia's contacts
Yuki will arrive in Chile in three weeks

Marcus Reid.state: Learning to collaborate despite years of solitary work
Marcus Reid.key_moment: Accepts Yuki's corrections to his methodology, recognizes value of team

Sofia Navarro.key_moment: Proposes going around institutions via ArXiv publication

Yuki Tanaka.state: Joins team, reveals her insecurities about riding past successes
Yuki Tanaka.key_moment: Admits most colleagues think she's just been lucky, wants to prove herself

planted_elements.description: Yuki admits her credibility is built on early successes and colleagues think she's just been lucky. She fears her reputation outpaces her actual capability.
planted_elements.significance: Her 'luck' was actually brilliance - completes the proof that saves humanity

knowledge_revealed: Five distinct encoding layers discovered in Voyager signal (up from three)
Signal shows multi-channel communication far beyond Voyager's capabilities
Team commits to ArXiv preprint strategy to bypass institutional gatekeeping
Yuki's cryptographic expertise identifies Marcus's methodology errors
Supercomputing resources needed and available through Sofia's contacts

causal_chains.effect: Team decides to work outside institutional approval, recruit specialists
Discovery of five encoding layers instead of three

tension_elements: Professional rivalry between Marcus and Yuki
Government surveillance implied (Vargas knew about meeting)
18-month countdown with potentially years of cryptographic work needed
Decision to publish via ArXiv despite career risks
world_state_changes: Yuki Tanaka joins team as equal partner
Team commits to ArXiv publication strategy
Five encoding layers identified in signal
Timeline: Yuki arrives in Chile in 3 weeks
